biotools.summary: This tool predicts local RNA secondary structures for multiple sequences in the Fasta format or scans local secondary structure of a single genomic sequence in the Fasta format. It scans the RNA sequence with a sliding window and extracts all LSS with sizes no longer than a window size using dynamic programming.

bioschemas.name: Rnall
bioschemas.summary: This tool predicts local RNA secondary structures for multiple sequences in the Fasta format or scans local secondary structure of a single genomic sequence in the Fasta format. It scans the RNA sequence with a sliding window and extracts all LSS with sizes no longer than a window size using dynamic programming.
